attributes.action: Implement zero tax on overtime worked in the UK like Donald Trump
attributes.additional_details: I firmly believe that implementing a similar regulation would be a step towards a fairer system, stimulating economic growth and symbolising our government's commitment to rewarding hard work. I urge you to consider this policy, taking a stand for the countless working citizens like myself.
attributes.background: As someone who regularly works overtime, I've personally experienced the financial strain of high taxes on additional working hours. I'm not alone - many hardworking citizens, like myself, are choosing to avoid extra work because the tax burden makes it scarcely worth our time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Don’t tax people on any overtime they work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701418
